transArray.content:
Cleanliness: The room is very clean
Service: The customer service is very polite!
Environment: Average. After all, in a car-selling environment, there are a lot of vehicles coming in and out, so pay more attention to the safety of entering and exiting!

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel rooms and the room ladies. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products and services we deliver are of reliable quality. , cleanliness and safety come first. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay. Thank you. ! Manager: Zhang Minghui
